# Support

## Getting Help

If you need help with this project, here are some resources:

### Documentation

- Check the [README](../README.md) for basic usage
- Read the [Architecture documentation](../docs/ARCHITECTURE.md)
- Review the [API documentation](../docs/API.md)

### Community Support

- Check [existing issues](../../issues) for similar problems
- Search [closed issues](../../issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aclosed) for solutions
- Ask questions in [Discussions](../../discussions)

### Reporting Bugs

- Use the [bug report template](./ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md)
- Include as much detail as possible
- Provide steps to reproduce

### Feature Requests

- Use the [feature request template](./ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature_request.md)
- Explain your use case clearly
- Describe the desired behavior

### Security Issues

- See [SECURITY.md](../SECURITY.md) for reporting vulnerabilities
- Do NOT create public issues for security problems

## Response Times

- Bug reports: Within 48 hours
- Feature requests: Within 1 week
- Pull requests: Within 1 week
- Security issues: Within 24 hours

## Contributing

See [CONTRIBUTING.md](../docs/CONTRIBUTING.md) for guidelines on contributing to this project.
